janadhipathi abdulla yaminta a. do. biliyana 1.5 ka dushana - akramikatha saha mudal wishuddhikaranaya pilibanda chodana ella karamin al jasira nalikawa sidukala aandolanathmaka helidarawwa eeta hethuwayi.

bulathsinhala aagaloya pradeshaye welendasalakata kada wadi gini awi penwa mudal kollakame naduwe palamu withthikaru adala chodanawata waradakaru bawa thiranaya kala kaluthara mahadhikarana winisuru amal thilakarathna mahatha ohuta barapathala wada sahitha wasara 55ka sira danduwamak niyama keleya.sira danduwamata amatharawa rupiyal 15000 dadayak da agathiyata path parshwayata rupiyal 45000 ka wandi mudalak da gewana lesa niyama kala winisuruwaraya dada ha wandi mudal nogewanne nam lihil sira danduwam niyama karana bawa da prakasha kaleya.1995 marthu masa 27 wani dina bulathsinhala aagaloya di kulasinha aarachchige premasinha yana ayage welendasalata kada wadi gini awi penwa mudal kollakama sambandhayen withthikaruwan 7 denakuta erehiwa chodana nanga nithipathiwaraya wisin me naduwa pawara thibuni.mehi sesu withthikaruwan 6 dena nadu wibhagaya aarambhayedima adala chodanawanta waradakaruwan bawa kiya siti heyin owunata min pera sira danduwam niyama kara thibuni..

pas une kisima deyak padam nokara habayi mama eka deyaknam kala klas giyama eda kiyala dena de hondata sawadanawa ahan indala mathaka thiya gaththa witharayi samaharu dan hithanawa athi mama panditha kamata boru kiyanawa kiyala eeth mek thama aththa anika mata padam karanna tharam honda situweshan ekak ape gedara thibbe na mokada mama usas pela panthiyata athulath welatika dawasak yaddi mage thaththa leda una passeyi api dana gaththe eyata pilikawak kiyala 2005 indala mama usas pela karanna masayak wenakam ma api kale eya ekka pilika rohale ottu una eka ¬†hariyatama mage wibhagayata masekata kalin mage thaththa apiwa dala giya marane wada katayuthu iwara unata passe ape ammage gedara kattiya sathi thunak withara yanakal ape gedara hitiye api 3denawa thaniyama dala yanna bari nisa magenam adahasa unema wibhage eelanga para karanna kiyala ee unatahamomagema balakirima matha mama ee awurudde wibhage kala ane manda pas weyi kiyala hithakawath thibbe na risalt aawa dawase amma kafe eken risalt balala kiwwama mekayi kiyala risalt kiyala mata hitha ganna bari una eeken mama ekak therum gaththa edineda iskole , klas wala kiyana dewal hariyata ahan innawanam wibhaga walata padam karanna ooni na kiyana eka pa.li: mama me kramaya athhada balala sarthaka prathipala thiyena nisa kiyanne nangila mallila meka karanna gihin wada waradunoth mage angata goda wennanam epa onna dola duka haduna ape gold fish adanam mama me podi madak gahanna yanne ape blog awakashe kenekta eya thamayai api kawuruth handunana ape maluwa nohoth gold fish ayiyata onna mama eeye wada arila yaddi minihata kol ekak dunna mama: halo malu ayiye kohomada gold fish: hondayi nangiyo oya oya koheda inne?
